Player History
Drafted in 35th round, 547th overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Injured on 6/6/2015 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Was claimed off waivers by Kansas City on 6/6/2015.
Had first career hit on 6/21/2015, off Antonio Montejano (BOS)...
Earned first career win on 6/26/2015...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Pitched NO-HITTER against St. Louis (B) on 6/10/2018, striking out 8...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2018, winning 2 games with a 0.60 ERA...
Injured on 7/20/2018 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/10/2020 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
9/1/2020: Signed a contract extension with Kansas City, $1,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from Kansas City to Montreal on 3/2/2021 (Going to KC: P Sam Ebron, P Danilo Menjivar. Going to MON: P Jordon Tookes)...
